backend/main.mo: Defines transaction types, data models, balance calculations, daily stats, access control initialization, and in-memory maps for transactions and user profiles in a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains high-level textual summaries of various frontend source files and their functionality.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling PIN-based offline authentication and rendering the dashboard or auth screens with global layout.
frontend/src/components/BackupRestore.ts: Provides UI for exporting and importing backup JSON files with expandable sections and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCards.tsx: Displays total and categorized balances with clickable gradient tiles that trigger transaction-type actions.
frontend/src/components/DailyTracking.ts: Empty or placeholder component file containing no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DaywiseTransacti: Displays transactions for a selected day, calculates stats, and stores per‑day user deductions in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/EditTransactionD: Dialog for editing an existing transaction with form fields and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/FilterTransactio: Filters transactions by date range and computes grouped daily stats with user deductions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with backup, restore, reset, and logout controls for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTransacti: Shows transactions filtered by month or year with type and search options and derived summary rows.
frontend/src/components/OpeningBalancesF: Form component to view, edit, and submit opening balance data with date handling and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/PinAuth.tsx: Handles PIN setup and verification with state management, error handling, and reset flow.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name during profile setup.
Form for creating transactions with type selection, date input, and submission via API.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays, filters, and manages transactions by month with edit and delete actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, managing login, identity state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePinAuth.ts: React hook managing PIN setup, hashing, verification, and session-based authentication using localStorage and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query utilities plus localStorage helpers for transactions, balances, user data, and opening balances with bigint handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, UI component overrides, animations, and enhanced calendar/select styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard UI with tab navigation, archive month selection, transaction form setup, and overview interactions.
frontend/src/utils/derivedTransactions.t: Generates derived transaction rows such as 10% savings and cheeti deductions based on stored transactions and user deductions.
Utility for determining transaction direction and returning corresponding color classes for amounts and icons.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing) and persist them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, and pending requests related to improving month archive UI and restoring visibility of older months’ history.
